philosophy.title: Augmentation, Not Replacement
philosophy.text: AI should be an augmentation of human reasoning, not a replacement of it. The goal is to build tools that amplify our own intelligence and creativity.

philosophy.title: Models as Tools
philosophy.text: Models are tools — intelligence emerges from the interaction with context. The true power of AI lies in the thoughtful orchestration of these tools to solve complex problems.

philosophy.title: Optimization Beyond Accuracy
philosophy.text: Optimization is not just about accuracy — it’s about transparency and controllability. A model that is 99% accurate but cannot explain its reasoning is a black box; a model that is 95% accurate and transparent is a partner.

philosophy.title: The Importance of the Interface
philosophy.text: The interface is the bridge between human and machine intelligence. A well-designed interface can make the difference between a powerful tool and an unusable one.
